snippet: Do you know anyone who takes herbal supplements? Have you ever seen these products in stores? Do you think the government should regulate herbal supplements more stringently?
abstract: Do you know anyone who takes herbal supplements? Have you ever seen these products in stores? Do you think the government should regulate herbal supplements more stringently?
lead_paragraph: In the article “Herbal Supplements Are Often Not What They Seem,” Fares Akram and Jodi Rudoren report on a recent study that found widespread adulteration and mislabeling in the herbal supplement industry.

headline.main: 6 Q’s About the News | Herbal Supplements Are Often Not What They Claim to Be
